last_episode_to_air.name: Secrets of the Lost City
last_episode_to_air.overview: The new treasure map leads Albert to discover lost pyramids, and treasures found across the Mayan world reveal the epic scale of the civilization.

name: Lost Treasures of the Maya
overview: A new "treasure map" of the Maya world is transforming what we thought we knew of one of the world most mysterious ancient civilizations.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Snake Altar
episodes.overview: The new treasure map leads to a lost fortress. A sacred altar leaves the jungle after 1,500 years and two cities reveal secrets of a forgotten war.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Underworld
episodes.overview: A mysterious pyramid, gruesome discoveries in uncharted cave systems and the spirit world of the Maya.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Sun God
episodes.overview: Divers search for an entrance to lost caves while archaeologists discover a ceremonial royal drinking cup that reveals the tomb of a lost king.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Lost City
episodes.overview: The new treasure map leads Albert to discover lost pyramids, and treasures found across the Mayan world reveal the epic scale of the civilization.
